data.text: @MemorialU The CCP has implemented a human ecocide program, sparrows have completely disappeared in some Chinese cities, pangolins have been commercially "extinct", bald dolphins have become extinct, and the extinction of animals and plants is irreversible
@MemorialU 中共真對人類實施生態滅亡計劃，麻雀已經在中國一些城市完全消失，穿山甲已被商業性「滅絕」，高鼻羚羊滅絕，白鳍豚滅絕，动植物灭绝不可逆转。
